about_the_game:
Dive into the world of 'Element Fighters,' the only multiplayer-arena fighting game, where you get to choose your destiny from four powerful nations - Air, Earth, Fire, and Water.
You fight against players all over the world with your nation. Every duel is a short action-driven, nerve inducing fight. Each attack costs chi, which slowly regenerates, so besides quick reflexes, sou also need good tactical thinking.

Here are some highlights of the game:

• Chose your nation and attacks before fights. Each has a unique ability and changes the tactic you need to chose during a fight.
• Upgrade your character by collecting experience points after successful fights. You get to chose which path your character goes on!
• Level up your attacks. You get to chose which attacks you want to strengthen, making them more powerful, increasing their range, and decreasing their cooldown time.
• Customize the appearance and increase your defense and strength with different clothes. Some need to be earned though.

By mastering the elements you can become the ultimate element fighter.

Here are some highlights of the game:

• Upgrade your character by collecting experience points after successful fights. You get to chose which path your character goes on!

name: Element Fighters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670K
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 770, AMD Radeon HD 7950

short_description: Element Fighters is the only third person multiplayer Arena-Shooter where you fight against players around the world using the four elements: Air, Earth, Water and Fire. Chose your nation and decide your destiny!
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
